General.Name: Tata Metaliks Limited
General.Description: Tata Metaliks Limited manufactures and sells pig iron and ductile iron pipes in India and internationally. It operates through two segments: Pig Iron and Ductile Iron (DI) Pipes. The company offers pig iron under the Tata eFee brand used in industries, such as automobile, agriculture and tractor, engineering and industrial, power, railways, aluminum shelters, and sanitary and decorative castings. It also provides DI pipes under the Tata Ductura brand for use in various applications, such as potable water supply, sewage, irrigation, and industrial usage in power plants. The company was incorporated in 1990 and is headquartered in Kolkata, India. Tata Metaliks Limited operates as a subsidiary of Tata Steel Limited.

3.Name: Mr. Rajesh  Mishra B. Tech, MBA
3.Title: EVP - Marketing and Sales, Strategy & Corp. Services
